about_the_game:
Seize the chance to overcome a formidable enemy.

You are the leader of a selected group of Celtic people (tribes) who will resist Caesar’s campaign of conquest. In this rogue-like strategy game, you take command of your tribe's journey through Europe, skillfully evading Roman forces.

With procedurally generated levels and real-time battles, you must constantly upgrade and equip your units while managing vital resources.

Secure the future of your nation.

  • Lead a Gallic tribe in resisting Caesar’s conquest during the turbulent Gallic Wars era (58-50 BC).
  • Navigate dynamic, randomly generated battlefields.
  • Evade pursuit as you journey across Europe.
  • Fight, trade, or embark on text-based adventures at each stop.

Prepare for battle.

  • Engage in brief hex-map battles lasting 5-10 minutes.
  • Customize formations, rank units, and equip them with various items.
  • Strengthen your camp defenses.
  • Craft weapons, armor, and war machinery.

Ensure survival against all odds.

  • Adapt to random events shaping combat conditions.
  • Experience over 100 story events with rewards or punishments.
  • Unlock secrets of druidic, martial, and tribal knowledge.
  • Embrace the unpredictable balance of randomly generated content and strategic choices.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @3.00 GHz / AMD FX-8320E Eight-Core

  • Graphics: Nvidia® GTX 1060

short_description: Tribe Nation is a roguelike strategy with real-time battles set in the Gallic Wars era. Lead your Celtic tribe across Europe to a new homeland. Strategize on a randomly generated hex battlefield, adapt to unexpected events, craft, improve, and equip. Make your tribe a nation.
